label: irishNSCId
comment: The unique Irish National Sorting Code (NSC) identifier as assigned by the Irish Payments Services Organisation (IPSO) for this creditor financial institution.
The unique Irish National Sorting Code (NSC) identifier as assigned by the Irish Payments Services Organisation (IPSO) for this debtor financial institution.

domainIncludes.comment: A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that owes money.
